name: Retro Shooter (Tauheed Game Dev)
description:
Fast-Paced Old School Retro Arcade Themed Space Shooter with a Hi-Score  System, Power-Ups and Multiple Enemies with Multiple Weapon Types. 

Beat the Hi-Score and Enter your Name at the Top for everyone to see.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move 

Space bar to Shoot 

Full Controller Support

Full Screen is Recommended

If You Want to Play the Game offline Download the Windows or Mac Versions Below.
